name: Natu

evolution.description: Natu can evolve into Xatu at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Tiny Bird Pokémon. The look in its eyes gives the impression that it’s carefully observing you. If you approach it, Natu will hop away.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: If this Pokémon becomes burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, its attacker receives the negative status condition as well (if not immune).

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: This Pokémon has advantage on rolls to wake from sleep.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when succumbing to a negative status effect, this Pokémon can instead reflect the effect back on the attacker.
